title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the AIJobRecruiter platform, including features, functionality, user roles and permissions, data models, integration with existing HR systems and job boards, scalability and performance requirements, security and compliance considerations, and any other relevant details.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AI components, user interfaces, data storage solutions, and integration with third-party services (e.g., job boards, background check providers).

title: Develop AI Candidate Screening Module
description: Implement the AI algorithms and models for screening and ranking job candidates based on their qualifications and job requirements.

title: Build Job Matching and Recommendation Engine
description: Develop the engine that matches qualified candidates with open job positions based on their skills, experience, and preferences.

title: Implement User Interfaces
description: Design and develop the user interfaces for candidates, recruiters, and HR managers, including job search, candidate profiles, and application tracking.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the database schema and data management solutions for storing and managing candidate profiles, job listings, and application data.

title: Integrate with Existing HR Systems
description: Develop interfaces and APIs to integrate the AIJobRecruiter platform with existing HR systems, such as applicant tracking systems and employee databases.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Design and implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure the privacy and protection of candidate and company data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the AIJobRecruiter platform to various environments.

title: Conduct Quality Assurance and Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the AIJobRecruiter platform.
dependencies: Build Job Matching and Recommendation Engine
Set up Data Storage and Management

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation, including architecture diagrams, API references, and user guides, to support the development, deployment, and maintenance of the AIJobRecruiter platform.
